name: Gerhard the Stone
aura: Increases Ally RES in Doom Tower Battles by 50.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 15% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn. Has a 40% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn instead if the target has more than 75% Turn Meter.

skills.desc:
Places a 30% [Increase C. RATE] buff and a 30% [Increase C. DMG] buff on this Champion for 2 turns, then attacks 1 enemy. 

Will ignore 25% of the target’s DEF. Will ignore 50% of the target’s DEF instead if the target is under an [Increase DEF] buff.
